name: Overcooked but it's a garbage
description:
Simple game made by myself.

Ain't gonna lie, the game called Overcooked heavily inspired me. I pretty much recreated the concept, but made it much worse and styled in voxel art.

Additions:

  • Singleplayer mode with literally no content
  • Multiplayer mode (up to 4 players online)
  • A bunch of kitchen tools, kitchen objects and recipes
  • Multiple character outfits

All the assets were created by me. The editors i used: Unity, Blender, MagicaVoxel, PhotoShop, Aseprite
